Say goodbye to uneven tone and hello to a luminous glow that turns heads. Just a few drops in the morning before sunscreen is all it takes to start your day with a radiant glow. Experience the simple path to luminous skin.

sections.heading: How to Use
sections.content:
Unlock a brighter, more radiant complexion with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum. Here's how to incorporate it into your morning routine:

  1. Start with a clean, dry face.
  2. Dispense 2–3 drops of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum onto your fingertips.
  3. Gently pat the serum onto your face, avoiding the eye area.
  4. Allow the serum to absorb fully into your skin.
  5. Follow up with your favorite broad-spectrum sunscreen.

Note: For sensitive skin, you may experience mild tingling upon initial application. This is normal and should subside. If irritation persists, discontinue use.
